Title: Localizable Content Query Web Part
Description: The Localizable CQWB is a specialization of the built-in MOSS Content by Query WebPart. The class extends the base class web part by allowing resource file look up from XSLT, GUI based selection of header and item XSL style files, choosing additional fields.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Localizable CQWB is a specialization of the built-in MOSS Content by Query WebPart. The class extends the base class web part by allowing resource file look up from XSLT, GUI based selection of header and item XSL style files, choosing additional fields.
